page.title: 17WALKINGTON ATTITUDES,PART 2.
page.content: 34.5% OF PEOPLE THOUGHT THE SHOP THE MOST DESIRABLE AMENITY IN WALKINGTON, BUT 18% FOUND IT NOT COMPREHENSIVE ENOUGH FOR THE GROWING VILLAGE. 16% APPRECIATED THE PLAYING FIELD AND 9% LIST SPORT CLUBS AS THE BEST LOCAL AMENITY.8.5% WOULD LIKE A FULL SPORTS_ CENTRE;8.5% WOULD ADD A SWIMMING POOL. MEDICAL CARE IS FOUND IN BEVERLEY.24% WOULD LIKE A MEDICAL CENTRE AND DISPENSARY PROVIDED LOCALLY. 20% WOULD WISH TO SEE GAS PIPED INTO THE VILLAGE. THERE ARE 2 PLACES OF WORSHIP;ALL HALLOWS,CofE,AND THE METHODIST CHURCH. 58% OF VILLAGERS EXPRESSED INTEREST IN THEM AND 2.2% IN A CHURCH OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE.16% SAID THEY WERE REGULAR ATTENDERS,36% WERE OCCASIONALLY.11% WORKED ACTIVELY FOR THE CHURCHES WHILE 49% SAID THEY SUPPORT CHURCH FUND RAISING EVENTS.200 HOUSEHOLDS ASKED.
